kavitha arumugam wrote:

> Dear All,
> 
>   How to test JunitTestcase without returning any
> return value such as String,object or boolean.
> 
> java code:
> public void Option()
> {
> }
> doesn't return any return value.But is checking
> business condition within the method.
> 
> I will appreciate ur help.Give some resolution.

If your method has no visible behavior, then it must have invisible 
behavior, otherwise it does nothing. Find the invisible behavior, 
extract it to its own method, then test that method.

Good luck.
